content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Ms. Wang. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Duisburg, let me start by proposing a higher figure than what you may have anticipated. Consider this initial offer of 1350 Euros per month. If you find this acceptable, I agree to the price of [1350] Euro! However, if you prefer to negotiate further, please let me know. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
